top.title: 'Difficult' Russia-Ukraine peace talks end without breakthrough
top.summary: The second day of negotiations between Ukraine and Russia ended after just two hours.

top.title: I would scream in my sleep: Women from Syria's Alawite minority tell of kidnap and rape
top.summary: The BBC hears harrowing accounts of assaults appearing to target the sect of former President Assad.

top.title: Rescuers search for nine missing skiers after California avalanche
top.summary: Rescuers are racing to the scene, which has seen about 30 inches (76cm) of snowfall in the last 24 hours.

top.title: Call of Duty advert banned for trivialising sexual violence
top.summary: Activision Blizzard UK Ltd said the ad for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 was targeted at adults.

top.title: 'I do not trust them' - top streamers left concerned by Discord age checks
top.summary: The platform's plan to roll out global age checks has caused concern in streaming communities.

top.title: V&A displays first YouTube video and watchpage
top.summary: The original YouTube experience from 2005 has been recreated using internet archives.
